author: Connell Smith
title: Potential mask makers turn to Maine/NB pulp and paper company
description: A global shortage of synthetic cloth material used in disinfectant wipes and some protective masks has manufacturers experimenting with paper products from a Maine and New Brunswick-based company in the fight against the spread of the COVID 19 virus.
content:
A global shortage of synthetic cloth material used in disinfectant wipes and some protective masks has manufacturers experimenting with paper products from a Maine and New Brunswickbased company in the fight against the spread of the COVID 19 virus.
